exceptions.tactic: intros T Ord s2 s1 x0 H1 H2 H3.
intros T' Ord s2 s1 x0 H1 H2 H3.
intros T' Ord' s2 s1 x0 H1 H2 H3.
intros T' Ord' s2' s1 x0 H1 H2 H3.
intros T' Ord' s2' s1' x0 H1 H2 H3.
intros T' Ord' s2' s1' x0' H1 H2 H3.

original: intros T Ord s2 s1 x0 H1 H2 H3. unfold sorted in H1, H2. destruct s1. - simpl. apply H2. - destruct s1. + simpl. apply H1. + simpl. apply and_comm. split. * apply H1. * apply H3.
